structure.unit: ARTICLE V. FLORIDA CITY COMMUNITY REDEVELOPMENT AREA

law.catch_line: Review of financial records; right of audit.

text.section:
Sec. 30A-125. Review of financial records; right of audit.
The financial records for the Fund shall be prepared pursuant to Section 163.387(8), Florida Statutes, as amended, and shall be available for County inspection. The County reserves the right of audit of the fund.
